column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. BASE HAS BEEN SECURED, SEND IN THE REINFORCEMENTS. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE CLEARED THE GATE. OVER.
THIS IS BRAVO BLACK. WE ARE ON THE OBJECTIVE AND TAKING CONTROL. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. WE ARE HEADING HOME. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. REINFORCEMENTS ON WAY. HOLD TIGHT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY THAT. GOOD WORK. YOUR MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
